name: The 1000 Dot-to-Dot Book
description:
*Postage only to Australian cities*
*New Stock has arrived*

It has been an amazing opportunity to publish my first book and I have the great opportunity to sell 50 through my website that I will sign to fans of dot-to-dot drawings. 

In an age of childhood fun for grown-ups, we bring you ‘The 1000 Dot-to-Dot Book. Thomas Pavitte has put together a unique collection of dot-to-dot puzzles, all of them consisting of 1,000 dots and taking a satisfyingly long time to complete. His unique style, when combined with iconic subjects, results in images that are not only fun to join, but cool enough to put on your wall.

Inside you’ll find:
Gandhi
Shakespeare
Alred Hitchcock
Elvis
Marilyn Monroe
Andy Warhol
John Lennon
Bob Marley
Mona Lisa
Michael Jackson
Audrey Hepburn
John F Kennedy
Van Gogh
Madonna
Albert Einstein
Muhammad Ali

48 pages 
h 420mm x w 300mm 
paperback full colour throughout 
700 words Printed 
ISBN:978-1-78157-104-0

name: ELVIS 1000 dots limited Edition
description:
Thomas Pavitte has selected a few of his favourite dot-to-dot drawings from his book - 'The 1000 Dot-to-Dot book' - and is offering them to be purchased as limited edition prints.

It is printed on Art quality Museo Portfolio Rag, 300gsm, 100% cotton stock.

This limited edition A3 (11.7 x 16.5 in) print of Elvis of 50 contains 1000 numbered dots that I have precisely positioned. It takes about an hour to complete and it's not tricky at all to do. The dots are colour coded into groups of 100, so they are easy to keep track of.

Please note that the print will come to you unfinished and you will have to connect the dots yourself.

All prints will be individually numbered and titled with a certificate of authenticity, packaged flat in a protective film inside of a rigid envelope. I will sign and number the work.

name: The Dots Connect – Trust me!
description:
This is only available as a Free PDF download for you to print out and join the dots. It's best if you can print it out on an A3 printer. It's a little tricky at A4 size, but I have tried it myself and it is possible to read the numbers.

I'm not going to show how it looks finished, you have to trust me that all the dots connect. The only clue that you get is that it's a quote from Steve Jobs

Right click or option-click the link and choose "Save As..." to download this file. The Dots Connect - Trust me PDF

Send me your results to thomas@thomasmakesstuff.com

name: The Life of Michael Jackson
description:
This limited edition A3 print (11.7 x 16.5 in) lets you create a unique art piece that shows the transformation of the Michael Jackson from child to man. This image shows how it looks finished, you will receive the print with just the dots and numbers. All you need is a pen, the ability to count numbers and a steady hand to draw.

It is one of the most remarkable transformations of an individual in history and I can think of no one better to launch my latest transformation series of dot-to-dot drawings with.

This limited edition print of 50 contains 960 numbered dots that I have precisely positioned. The first 335 dots create an image of the young Jackson and when the remaining dots are joined up it reveals the modern version of Jackson before his untimely death. I recommend using two differently coloured pens so that you can still see both versions when looking up close.

It takes about an hour to complete. The dots are colour coded into groups of 100, so they are easy to keep track of.

All prints will be individually numbered and titled with a certificate of authenticity, packaged flat in a protective film inside of a rigid envelope. I do not sign the works myself - part of the experience is that you will complete my autograph for me when you complete the final few dots. I am offering a limited edition of 50 - there will be no more of this version if they sell out, but there are new works to come in my transformation series.

To take a more detailed look at this piece, please visit my website to see the see my friends creating the first Life of Michael Jackson print.

name: Yes You Can Obama
description:
This is the second limited edition A3 print (11.7 x 16.5 in) in my latest Transformation Series. This image shows how it looks finished, you will receive the print with just the dots and numbers. All you need is a pen, the ability to count numbers and a steady hand to draw.

With President Obama's quest for a second term approaching in 2012, many are doubting whether he is the right man for the job. For what's it's worth, I say this directly to you Mr. President - "Yes you can!"

It takes about an hour to complete. The dots are colour coded into groups of 100, so they are easy to keep track of. This piece contains 870 dots.

All prints will be individually numbered and titled with a certificate of authenticity, packaged flat in a protective film inside of a rigid envelope. I do not sign the works myself - part of the experience is that you will complete my autograph for me when you complete the final few dots. I am offering a limited edition of 50 - there will be no more of this version if they sell out, but there are new works to come in my transformation series.

Check out a time-lapse video of this piece here - Click here.

name: Monkey Jesus
description:
This limited edition A3 print (11.7 x 16.5 in) lets you create a unique art piece that shows the evolution on man. This image shows how it looks finished, you will receive the print with just the dots and numbers. All you need is a pen, the ability to count numbers and a hand to draw.

Many people have their own belief about how man came to be on Earth. I believe in evolution and I mean no disrespect to anybody who has a different view.

This limited edition print of 50 contains 1000 numbered dots that I have precisely positioned. It takes about an hour to complete and it's not tricky at all to do. The dots are colour coded into groups of 100, so they are easy to keep track of.

All prints will be individually numbered and titled with a certificate of authenticity, packaged flat in a protective film inside of a rigid envelope. I do not sign the works myself - part of the experience is that you will complete my autograph for me when you complete the final few dots. I am offering a limited edition of 50 - there will be no more of this version if they sell out, but there are new works to come in my transformation series.

name: Mona Lisa 6,239
description:
This is an A2 (16.5 x 23.4 inches) print of my unofficial world record for the most complex dot-to-dot drawing containing 6,239 dots. It is a high resolution scan of my completed original drawing - this is not available as a dot-to-dot that you complete. The print quality is fantastic - I think it looks better than my original.

There has been a lot of international interest in this work. A google search will bring up many websites and blogs that it features on. I have done interviews for print and radio and even had an article written about it in the Australian Herald Sun.

All prints will be individually numbered and titled with a certificate of authenticity, packaged in a protective film rolled inside a tube.

I am offering a limited edition of 50 - there will be no more of this version if they sell out.

To take a more detailed look at this project and see a timelapse video of it being created, Click Here
